Title: Requires the state comptroller to prepare and release an annual report grading each state agency on its spending with minority and women-owned business
Summary: Requires the state comptroller to prepare and release an annual report grading each state agency on its spending with minority- and women-owned business.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring the state comptroller to prepare and release an annual report grading each state agency on its spending with minority and women-owned business enterprises; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
